SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.handlers

Class ManagerHandlers

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.handlers.ManagerHandlers
public class ManagerHandlers extends Object
The ManagerHandlers class manages the mapping between message types and their corresponding message handlers. It allows for registering and retrieving message handlers based on the message type.

    • registerEventHandler

      public void registerEventHandler(MessageType eventType, MessageHandler messageHandler)
      Registers a message handler for a specific message type.
      Parameters:
      eventType - The message type to register the handler for.
      messageHandler - The message handler to register.

    • handleMessageFromServer

      public void handleMessageFromServer(Message message) throws Exception
      Handles a message received from the server by invoking the appropriate message handler.
      Parameters:
      message - The message received from the server.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while handling the message.
